Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
13.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
16.03.2012 SH SCR17202 Added button Payment, incl. BPOR_BADP_ID tests
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
13.04.2011 SH SC16378 Added HUSR_DEFAULT_ADMNO to fetch ADMN_CURRENCY
to initialize BPOR_CURRENCY
01.03.2011 SH SCR16238 Added new admin currency logic (removed GNRL_CURRENCY)
01.02.2010 GB SCR15231 Extended selection with ADMU_ALLOW_MODIFY_BANK = Y
only if BPOR_LDGR_ADMNO > 0
26.03.2009 SH SCR14514 Added (BDET) bank account approval handling
06.02.2009 GB SCR14368 Replaced 'F2'Kbd by RaiseEvent = Cancel
20.09.2006 JJ SCR11425 OPH112A added call BCM027A for first approval
04.01.2006 SH SCR10012 OPH112A Changed BCM027.PI.TPYE from 1 to 20
30.06.2005 JJ SCR8591 New arguments call BCM027
21.06.2005 SH SCR8520 Update PAIN_ADMNO_DEBTOR = BPOR_LDGR_ADMNO now,
before 1 was used, see part "Updates All/Line OK"
05.01.2005 SH SCR7608 Added new field PAIN_AUTOCOLLSTORNO, init with 'N'
07.12.2004 SH SCR7442 Enable BPOR_CURRENCY to be modifiable and recalc
BPOR_AMOUNT to GNRL_CURRENCY for TMPL bookings
18.10.2004 SH SCR7202 Disabled button "New" if user has only query rights
//12.10.2004 EE SCR#7169 changed value of ADML_LYTP_TYPE for link
-- Disabled 'Create Line' in Online task in MODIFY MODE
-- Button handling
-- Initial settings
-- Perform Updates --> All Lines OK
-- Perform Updates --> 1 Line OK
One line OK, prevent accidental handling of all lines (check v.BPOR_BDET _ID <>0
-- Delete selected BPOR row
-- Add new BPOR row
-- Close OPH112
@ This task has some special conditions to force the record suffix
1. If an new BPOR was added (button "NEW") then some mandatory fields
have to be entered
2. If descriptions were modified/deleted (tabel BPOD)--> also manadatory
3. If user presses key 'Esc'
-- See also Setting in TaskControl - Force Record Suffix, need to
cycle the R.S. if the USER pressed key 'Esc' after scrolling
through the table and all rows are stored
-- Input-Fields
-- Set variables
-- Calculate total of BPOR_AMOUNT
... build dynamic SQL_WhereClause, dependent on selection criterias
-- Disable menu if no row exists in BPOR
-- If key 'Esc' pressed by USER or he starts an other program
-- directly from the menue out of this program, the following BLOCK
-- will be executed --> -- Ask USER for confirmation if he changed
-- data
-- KBPUT ('F2'KBD) because if no record was selected for one user this task
-- go to CREATE MODE and the empty record does not have to store to database
-- KBPUT ('F2'KBD) because if no record was selected for one heller group this
-- task go to CREATE MODE and the empty record does not have to store to databas

ExpSyntax.val: (KbGet (0)='Esc'KBD OR {1,22} OR {1,23}) AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND InStr ({1,2},'M')<>0

Text.val: ... set FALSE if mandatory fields are stored for new BPOR fields
... amount muts be <> 0
... currency must be entered
... invalid admno
... invalid ledger number
... no descritions are entered
-- Used to force the R.S. in the calling task

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast(sum(BPOR_AMOUNT) as decimal(18,2)) FROM :1/BPOR WHERE BPOR_APPROVED = 'N' :2 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- First approval
-- Second approval
... check if actual user has sufficient rights
... user has sufficient rights
... store PAIN to handle the transfer of money
-- Store ledger bookings
... recalculate amount to admin currency
-- Final ledger bookings
... serach for bank details
... Error message: "Bankaccount is not approved yet"
... if an approved bank was selected in OPH110 --> store new BPOR row
... uses to locate new row, if screen will be opened
